remarks: The cyclic subgroup generated by an element ` A ` is a subset of any subgroup containing ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
cycsubg.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
cycsubg.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
cycsubg.f $e |- F = ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x .x. A ) ) $.
cycsubgss $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ A e. S ) -> ran F C_ S ) $.
$d .x. x $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d S x $.
$d X x $.
